features: 100% NATURAL COTTON - Our Tampons are made from GMO-free cotton and are 100% biodegradable, hypoallergenic and gynaecologically tested.

DESIGNED FOR COMFORT - Designed and manufactured with comfort in mind, our applicator free tampons feature a strong and reliable 100% cotton string and are healthy, safe, effective and irritation free.
FREE FROM HARMFUL CHEMICALS - Veeda tampons are pesticide, dioxin, chemical, chlorine, dye, fragrance and synthetic FREE.
REDUCES RISK OF TOXIC SHOCK SYNDROME - Oxygen cleansing creates a pesticide free product, ensuring only 100% natural cotton touches your body.
FUNCTIONAL AND COMFORTABLE - Customers report LESS DISCOMFORT and SHORTER PERIODS.
ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY EUROPEAN MANUFACTURING - In ISO 4001 Compliant facilities, with biodegradable packaging.
body.description: Veeda Tampons provide the comfort and reliability you want. Made with 100% Natural cotton and no harmful ingredients. Made with specialized grooves for all-around coverage to help prevent leaks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Applicator free tampons for a more sustainable, plastic free choice. Just as natural as a period. Veeda Non-Applicator Tampons are made with ultra-absorbent all-natural 100% cotton for reliable, leak-proof protection. Designed with specialized grooves for added absorption and all-natural cotton string for easy removal. Available in: Lite, Regular, Super & Super Plus with Compact BPA-Free Applicator or Applicator Free Synthetic and/or scented period care products can irritate the sensitive skin of the vulva. Veeda tampons are natural, hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested, which is very important for health. In fact, statistics show that yeast infections are less likely to occur with natural products that contain no chemicals and fragrances. Our 100% natural cotton is sourced directly from a global network of leading cotton traders and all cotton is cleansed with an oxygen cleansing process, not chlorine-bleached, for a healthier eco-friendlier product. This process removes all dirt and impurities including any synthetic matter and this is the exact same process by which all organic cotton is cleansed with, to ensure it also has no synthetic substances. This ensures that the final tampons are truly 100% natural cotton. Veeda tampons are lab-tested for over 250 harmful chemicals and contain no wood or synthetic fibres, no additives, no harsh chemicals and no dioxins. Another advantage to using 100% pure, hypoallergenic cotton, is that cotton does not contribute to the growth of the bacteria that causes Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS), irritation and allergic reactions. BETTER FOR YOU, BETTER FOR THE PLANET - Veeda tampons are made with naturally soft, absorbent 100% pure GMO-Free cotton (that’s it, nothing else!) ensuring that your body only meets with the purest, irritation free ingredients. Since 100% pure cotton is made by nature, it biodegrades by nature and won’t build up in landfill.

Tampons for Teens These ultra thin tampons are also great for teens and tweens and girls who are new to periods or new to tampons. If you're looking for junior tampons for teens, beginner tampons for teens or small tampons for teens, these non applicator tampons for teens and tweens are naturally perfect. Ultra thin tampons Everyday tampons Teen tampons Tween tampons Regular tampons Applicator free tampons

Many of us are conscious of the ingredients in the foods we eat and the products we put on our skin and hair, choosing the hypoallergenic, organic or natural options. Yet, somehow, there is extremely low awareness among women of what ingredients are used in their sanitary protection products and what implications they may have for their health. We believe that natural products are better for you and for our planet. We also believe that when it comes to products that touch the skin, particularly in the most intimate parts of the body, it’s important to know exactly where it came from and how it got there. This is why we are committed to ensuring that all of our products contain ONLY pure, hypoallergenic, 100% natural cotton with No Nasty Chemicals and No Dyes. Unlike other brands, our cotton is grown naturally, not manufactured or altered. Plus, all our products are gently cleansed with oxygen and are chlorine-free. Conventional period care products from well-known brands can be made from blends of bleached cotton and/or synthetic products. They can also contain dioxins from the bleaching process, herbicide residues, synthetic chemicals, artificial fragrances, and dyes. We want to make sure that our products are kinder to the earth in every way possible. After learning how conventionally made feminine care products affected our body and environment, Veeda was created. The average woman uses 11,000 feminine care products in her lifetime; this fact alone keeps us inspired to create a top of line sustainable process when manufacturing our products. Veeda products are made with pure, hypoallergenic, 100% natural cotton. Our cotton is grown naturally, not manufactured or altered. Both our tampons and pads are gently cleansed with oxygen and are chlorine-free. Veeda tampons are made only with 100% Natural Cotton and have No Nasty Chemicals, No Synthetics, and No Dyes. Knowing the facts, consider making a better choice by making Veeda your go-to natural period care brand.
ABOUT VEEDA We created Veeda because you and your body deserve the best. No harsh chemicals here — just natural goodness that always goes with the flow (literally).

Better for You No Chemicals. No Synthetics. No Dyes. Our applicator-free tampons are 100% natural GMO-free cotton and hypoallergenic. Natural leak-free protection you can count on! Better for the planet Our tampons are packaged using recyclable materials. Veeda is committed to sustainably-sourced ingredients and safe manufacturing processes. Better for all We’re working to end period poverty once and for all. Every time you buy a Veeda product, you help us deliver period care essentials to those who need them the most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non toxic tampon
reviews.reviewText: No applicator, if it doesn’t bother you that it doesn’t t have a applicator, it doesn’t have all the toxins in it that most have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm a big fan of applicator free tampons. They are quiet and less wasteful. I buy these every month. They are good quality and comfortable. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used OB since I was 13- over 30 years, oh my!They have changed their formula and now hurt. I found these as a good replacement considering that OB changed to force us to buy their organic version for more $.I went in search on organic non applicator tampons and have been very happy with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as good as O.B., but alright.
reviews.reviewText: OK product. They are small and nearly same size as O.B. but that's where similarity ends. They pull apart easily when opening them so you have cotton fluff just hanging out. They have not leaked for me but I feel like they need to be changed more frequently then O.B ever did. Opening the dang thing is where you learn if you are a patient person or not. So hard to fine the start spot to open them.I would buy again only because of price and minor inconvenience of cotton fluff doesn't really deter me from use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars buying in bulk
reviews.reviewText: Great not to have to get these at the store. Work just as well as OB. I like no applicator - less plastic waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like OB Tampons
reviews.reviewText: These are just like OB tampons. I like them a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars My daughter uses them and they just weren't as absorbant.
reviews.reviewText: It was harder to get the string apart from the tampon, they aren't as absorbent as the OB ones she is used to and they weren't as comfortable for her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I used these and only these. They’re great and easy to put in my pocket when I’m out and need to keep one on me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m not a heavy bleeder but these hold so very little blood!

These are good tampons and I'm glad that they are organic. They definitely have less plastic on them that an average tampon but it would be great if they could replace the plastic covering with a plant-based, compostable plastic.
I love it ! It's perfect for light to medium days
